name: test_routing
description:
arrange: configure vips and ip addresses on test and wireguard units.
    act: add routes and execute ping commands between test units.
    assert: verify success of ping commands to confirm routing.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: configure vips and ip addresses on test and wireguard units.
act: add routes and execute ping commands between test units.
assert: verify success of ping commands to confirm routing.
